商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Washed it one time and it came apart at the seem

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: The material is absolutely great! The fit is dead on and the length is exactly where I like it falling a bit below my hips. The extra touch of the shirt, which makes it superior to others, is the small gathering on both sides which is super attractive and flattering.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: ALRIGHT I don’t usually review my purchases but I had to for this one. I have never bought amazon clothing until now. THESE tank tops are absolutely amazing and I was expecting something awful. Not going to lie. They are so soft and SO flattering. I have a curvy figure with small waist but that unwanted area of gross pudge buildup on my lower abdomen/tummy just makes wearing fitted tank tops a burden and I hate how I look. For reference I am 5 ft 5 inches and currently weight 176 lbs. I wear a size 36D for bras, usually M/L shirts and typically jeans are anywhere from 8-12 in size depending on brand and whether or not I’m having a good day haha. I got these tank tops in a medium and I’m so happy. They’re not too fitted but not too loose to where I look like I’m fatter than I am with how the shirt hangs on me. The ruching on the sides is SO flattering and makes the top versatile as casual wear to something you can dress up for a night out. I recommend 100%

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: The fabric is very soft. Flattering style. However I will be returning and purchasing this top in a sz Lg. Reading the other reviews saying they ran "big" - well they don't - I mistakenly ordered a medium, so purchase your true size. And if you do order a lighter colored top, know they are a tad see thru. Reference: I'm 5'3" 150lbs.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I ordered the royal blue color but it looks a bit more blue/purple.. I wasn't excited about that but then I tried it on. I am 5'5", 175, 36DD and I ordered an XL. I definitely could have went with a large. The shirt is not super thin but not heavy at all. The fit is very flattering but a bit long. I tucked the front into my jeans and it was perfect length. It can be worn casual with shorts but I like it dressed up with some jeans and heels. Not a fan of this color but love the fit, I will be ordering in black. Its going to be a staple in my closet.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Fits as expected. Overall I like this item however the color is off. I ordered the burgundy and loved the color in the photo in reality it’s a rust color which is the color I really don’t like. Maybe you do though!I also purchased this product in the The navy blue with Daisies. I thought the photo looks classy and this would be more of a sophisticated tank top that could be worn out to dinner etc. it’s definitely just a tank top for casual casual wear. Not to be paired with the skirt or try to dress it up. And again the color is off. It is not navy blue Or dark blue it’s just a medium denim blue the Daisy pattern is different as well and looks more like an older woman or grandmother would wear. Not what I expected expected.That said the materials good quality and the fit is really good.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I've been looking for a tank this color to go under a plaid button down.  Perfect match!  I bought a size large based on reviews but if I purchase more, I will size down.  It's a bit longer that I expected, but I am only 5'2".Will probably purchase again.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Love the fabric and the rouched sides

留言內容: I originally ordered this in an XL, but it wasn't as loose around the waist as I needed it to be.  I do have a tummy so it may look better on others.  I did order the 2 xl to see if that would work, but it's way TOO big. I guess in this one i'm an XL 1/2, lol.  I will keep it and wear it around the house because I do love the print and style!

留言內容: Nothing wrong with the top itself. Personally I did not find it to be flattering or the quality I hoped it would be. I returned the tops and I will say that experience was 100% professional. (So, 3 stars for tank top and an added star for excellent customer service.)

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I am wearing a Large. It has some elastic give to it but not much. I am 5’4 174lbs.An xl would fit a bit looser but I like it more fitted. I do work out so I am toned up.And I love the colors! I bought several of different colors. I like the v neck line - it makes us look slimmer and the sides have a little elastic to give you a great look.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I bought multiple colors of this tank after purchasing the black one and liking the fit and feel of the fabric.  Some of them seems to be a different blend of fabrics as the "5-tank Top-daisies" one is a bit shiny and not a true navy, it is lighter than navy.  If I had remembered to return it before the month was up that would have been returned as it was not the color I wanted.  The "5-tank Top-lotus" has a bit more orange and is brighter than the image on the screen, I kept it but it is not my favorite.  The "3-dark Pink" is not a dark pink at all, it is a brighter pink than shown.  The "3-tank Top-wine" is as shown and one of my favorites besides the black.  These have a nice look to them and I have paired them with jeans or skirts easily.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Not the hot pink I wanted to come close to a shrug I have and wanted to pair it with. I'll find another way to wear this tankI like the ruching on the sides. Front drops low enough to conceal my poochy problem mid-drift.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Fits great! Good for work with a jacket.  Then perfect for after work.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: The top is fine, didn’t read the description carefully so I didn’t expect the side “rouching” but the color is not even close to being navy blue. It is closer to purple/indigo. Even my husband who barely differentiates between colors said, “that looks purple”. I like my new purple/indigo tooo but I still need a Navy one.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Runs on the small side.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: My journey for sleepless shirts is always challenging. This one is cute, stretching, and still have a good coverage. I got an xL in black stripes.Unfortunately has a very strong burnt smell out of the package. Kind of like burnt plastic. I'm currently on the third wash. The first wash was just detergent and OxiClean. The second wash was detergent and white vinegar. We'll see if soaking it in white vinegar and blue dawn dish soap works. Otherwise it's so strong I won't be able to wear it.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: It fit just like it should have, I love the gathering on the sides they kinda dress the shirt up.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: This shirt is very pretty. The wine color is great and I really like the side ruching. The problem is that it's just a touch too short. I got the 3x in hopes it would be a bit longer and looser (I typically wear 1x-2). If I lift my arms at all, the side lifts and skin shows. Like I said, it's a great shirt overall, but if you're top heavy like me, this may not be the shirt for you for anything other than very casual settings.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: It’s better than I expected. I wanted simple tank tops that were loose enough to cover my belly, but still gave me some shape. The ruching on the sides helps give shape. Looks great with a light cardigan or sweater and works well with skirts or jeans. For reference, I’m about 5’4” and weigh between 175-180 depending on the day. I find I tend to be between a large and an XL. I sized up for this top and I’m glad I did. I think a large wouldn’t have been as flattering.I’m also quite happy with the colors. They were exactly what I expected.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I really like this paint. It’s nice and soft. I can wear it with regular bra. The colors coordinate well with the color palette. I already on as in shorts and pants. I got it on sale as well, so that never hurts!

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I have gone back to working in a law office.... AFTER I gave away all my business suits....I now require business attire, Again LOL...I wanted a comfortable with a casual fitted look....these tops are perfect!!! the gathered fitted sides make for a very composed look under a blazer, suit jacket or even a vest. WORTH EVERY PENNY! I bought it in 2 colors....so Happy!

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: As most people, I'm typically skeptical about purchasing clothes online without being able try them on. After reading the reviews, I was oscillating between ordering a M or L (I'm typically a L - 38D, 10-12, generally curvy figure, 5'5, 180 lbs). I ordered a L and glad I did! It fits....not baggy, not too tight. I have a slight spare tire, so this hugs those curves, but not too badly. Medium definitely wouldn't have been flattering. I like that it's long enough to cover most of my rear, making it good to wear with leggings. I'll probably buy a couple more in different colors. Great casual top for summer or under a cardigan/blazer. The rouching on the sides makes it a bit more interesting than a plain-jane tank top.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: i had previously ordered a large, which fit a little tight, but I still wear it. I also like to wear under a cardigan as well. I decided to order in another color but go up one size (XL) for less of that fit like a glove fit! The XL was far too big and sagging / hanging on my body. Disappointed to say the least. Sending it back, maybe i will try to order another color in an XL and see if its any better or worse.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: The first time I bought this shirt I got an XL and fit great (still does). I decided to get more colors but this time the size is smaller and the fabric is thinner. I got hot pink and you can see through at the right angle.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: A flattering shirt that makes you feel pretty. Love the color and received numerous compliments. Kept its coloring and shape through many washes and a very soft fabric

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Rose/bright pink. Love the color, size and softness!

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I love how this tank fit me. There was no side boob or low gaps under arms which show your bra. The material is a little rough but I'm sure it will be fine after a wash. I would definitely buy again! I'm 5'2"185lbs and purchased the XL.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Would have ordered a larger size…sides and up too much and appeared smaller than should have been.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I absolutely love these tank tops.  The small gathering on the sides gives them a fitted but very comfortable fit, while holding their shape.  It’s hard to find larger tank tops that don’t make you feel slouchy or have a drooping neckline.  The colors are beautiful too.  A little more cost but worth it!

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I literally never leave reviews (and I'll update with a picture in a couple days).I am 5'5", 173, 36DD, 31 waist, and 40 hips. It's not tight, but it's not super form-fitting. It sits in all the right places, and fits PERFECT. I ordered a coral and a navy. The coral is a pretty, bright coral. The navy, however, couldn't be further from blue, and is rather a PURPLE. I'm seriously disappointed because I ordered it specifically because I needed a NAVY blue shirt.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Looking for a tank tops with some coverage that weren't tunic length. This fits the bill. I ordered one in black but I think I'm going to get a couple more colors. The sheering on the sides is a really cute look and it causes the front to wrinkle a little so it covers up my wine barrel lol. I'm 5'3 125 and a medium was a perfect fit. Also like the lightweight of it but not see-through

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I have purchased 4 of these. Size large.  One was a solid color. Probably could have gone a size smaller in that one. The floral ones are a different material. Love them both. I also purchased a 3/4 open front cardigan for evenings. Looks really cute together

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: This fits right in all the right places. Not loving the shiny synthetic material. Rushing is so flattering. I have other synthetics that are not shiny like this so I thought it would be more cotton-ey looking. The color is lovely.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: Ran a bit big. I exchanged it for a small. I am 5’4” 135lbs.Nice tank. Colors are true ,won’t wrinkle, looks nice.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: This is a gorgeous color and perfect for summer! Only thing is threat it isn't ther most flattering to the tummy area,  this is my fault, not the shirts lol.  I will try and order an xl which is my normal size.  I sized down based on reviews but its pretty true to size maybe even slightly bigger. 留言內容: I purchased this bodysuit in a large a few months ago. I am an athletic woman, 6’ tall about 195 lbs, 40b cup. The large fits very well, very flattering and comfortable. I have been wearing it with skirts, yoga, pants, shorts, and mini skirts. I would purchase this bodysuit again.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I am 5'4", 145 lbs., large busted (34DDD).  I wear between a Medium and Large.  Ordered this in a Large and it was slightly too large, and a medium would probably have fit better. The floral print is vibrant and pretty, but there was a stray black ink-like mark center front.  The mark was from their printing of the fabric, it was not a stain.

留言內容: I absolutely love these tanktops (I also purchased one in black). I'm normally a true medium but reading reviews decided to go w/smalls for both, glad I did. Yes the material is polyester & spandex almost similar to like a swim suit material BUT, it can actually be a good option for hiding sweat because it repels moisture — and when it does get wet, it dries quickly. I cannot take summer heat so for me these tops r everything. Will definitely be ordering more.

商品名稱: Jescakoo 女款 V 領背心 休閒 無袖 襯衫 寬鬆版型 夏季
留言內容: I'm 5'7" - ~180 lbs - size 12ish - 36G.  I ordered a my normal size (large) in black, and it's PERFECT.  The material is so, so soft and breathable without being see-through.  It highlights my waist, but is super-forgiving on my tummy even with the side ruching, and the v-neck isn't too low for work even with my giant chest.  I ordered 3 more in different colors, and will likely order duplicates of the black next payday because it is perfect for work in the summer.  I'll update with photos once the other colors come in.TLDR; This is the perfect top and I can't recommend it enough.
